title: B.S. Report - Greg Wyshynski and Alan Sepinwall
description: Greg Wyshynski of Yahoo Sports joins Bill to discuss the NHL playoffs and what went wrong for the L.A. Kings. Then Alan Sepinwall of HitFix talks Sunday-night TV.
